text: @RyanAFournier @realDonaldTrump Okay Mr Fournier & to answer your question about if CNN would report on the Progress from the President as to the work he's doing as to the Covid-19 Pandemic situation etc; Probably not, bc they aren't in the business of putting a Positive Spin on Anything pertaining to Trump!!!!
